Uses of Interface
jakarta.nosql.column.ColumnCondition

  • Packages that use ColumnCondition 
    Package Description
    jakarta.nosql.column
    Defines the API to Column Family API in communication level.

    • Uses of ColumnCondition in jakarta.nosql.column

      Methods in jakarta.nosql.column that return ColumnCondition 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.and​(ColumnCondition condition)
      Creates a new ColumnCondition using the Condition.AND
      static ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.and​(ColumnCondition... conditions)
      Returns a new ColumnCondition aggregating ,as "AND", all the conditions as just one condition.
      ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.ColumnConditionProvider.and​(ColumnCondition... conditions)
      Creates a Condition.AND operation
      static ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.between​(Column column)
      Creates a ColumnCondition that has a Condition.BETWEEN, it means a select will scanning to a column family that is between two values informed on a column name.
      static ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.between​(String name, Object value)
      an alias method to between(Column) (Column) where it will create a Column instance first and then apply te condition.
      ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.ColumnConditionProvider.between​(Column column)
      Creates a Condition.BETWEEN operation
      static ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.eq​(Column column)
      Creates a ColumnCondition that has a Condition.EQUALS, it means a select will scanning to a column family that has the same name and equals value informed in this column.
      static ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.eq​(String name, Object value)
      an alias method to eq(Column) where it will create a Column instance first and then apply te condition.
      static ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.gt​(Column column)
      Creates a ColumnCondition that has a Condition.GREATER_THAN, it means a select will scanning to a column family that has the same name and the value greater than informed in this column.
      static ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.gt​(String name, Object value)
      an alias method to gt(Column) where it will create a Column instance first and then apply te condition.
      static ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.gte​(Column column)
      Creates a ColumnCondition that has a Condition.GREATER_EQUALS_THAN, it means a select will scanning to a column family that has the same name and the value greater or equals than informed in this column.
      static ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.gte​(String name, Object value)
      an alias method to gte(Column) where it will create a Column instance first and then apply te condition.
      ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.ColumnConditionProvider.in​(Column column)
      Creates a Condition.IN operation
      static ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.in​(Column column)
      Creates a ColumnCondition that has a Condition.IN, it means a select will scanning to a column family that has the same name and the value is within informed in this column.
      static ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.in​(String name, Object value)
      an alias method to in(Column) where it will create a Column instance first and then apply te condition.
      static ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.like​(Column column)
      Creates a ColumnCondition that has a Condition.LIKE, it means a select will scanning to a column family that has the same name and the value is like than informed in this column.
      static ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.like​(String name, Object value)
      an alias method to like(Column) where it will create a Column instance first and then apply te condition.
      static ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.lt​(Column column)
      Creates a ColumnCondition that has a Condition.LESSER_THAN, it means a select will scanning to a column family that has the same name and the value lesser than informed in this column.
      static ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.lt​(String name, Object value)
      an alias method to lt(Column) where it will create a Column instance first and then apply te condition.
      static ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.lte​(Column column)
      Creates a ColumnCondition that has a Condition.LESSER_EQUALS_THAN, it means a select will scanning to a column family that has the same name and the value lesser or equals than informed in this column.
      static ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.lte​(String name, Object value)
      an alias method to lte(Column) where it will create a Column instance first and then apply te condition.
      ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.negate()
      Creates a new ColumnCondition negating the current one
      ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.ColumnConditionProvider.or​(ColumnCondition... conditions)
      Creates a Condition.OR operation
      ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.or​(ColumnCondition condition)
      Creates a new ColumnCondition using the Condition.OR
      static ColumnCondition ColumnCondition.or​(ColumnCondition... conditions)
      Returns a new ColumnCondition aggregating ,as "OR", all the conditions as just one condition.
      Methods in jakarta.nosql.column that return types with arguments of type ColumnCondition 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Optional<ColumnCondition> ColumnDeleteQuery.getCondition()
      getter the condition If empty, Optional.empty() is true, the implementation might either return an unsupported exception or delete same elements in the database.
      Optional<ColumnCondition> ColumnQuery.getCondition()
      The conditions that contains in this ColumnQuery If empty, Optional.empty() is true, the implementation might either return an unsupported exception or returns same elements in the database.
